name: Pizza 4 Dead 2
description:
Pizza 4 Dead 2 is game made for Trijam #49. The total development time is 3 hours.

The game is about a Billy, who is a pizza delivery boy trying to do his job. There is a deadly virus that turns people into zombies spreading in the world. But a mere zombie apocalypse is not stopping Billy from doing his job!

Souurce code: https://bitbucket.org/DavidFlorek/pizza-4-dead-2
